item.title: Invesco QQQ Sponsor Spotlight
item.description: Ryan McCormack, Senior Director, Factor & QQQ Equity Product Strategy at Invesco, joins Bloomberg’s Christine Cook to discuss rethinking possibilities in college athletics at Bloomberg Power Players i

item.title: Invesco Says Treasuries Appeal More Than European Bonds on Rates
item.description: Treasuries are a better investment than European bonds as the case for Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts mounts and the traditional haven status of US government debt is reestablished, according to I
